title: French Toast with Berries
ingredients: Bread, eggs, milk, sugar, butter, berries
description: A classic breakfast dish made with fluffy french toast topped with fresh berries.
reviewText: Delicious! The berries were perfectly ripe.

title: Thai Green Curry with Chicken
ingredients: Chicken breast, green curry paste, coconut milk, vegetables, rice
description: A flavorful Thai curry with chicken, vegetables, and creamy coconut milk.
reviewText: I would have preferred more vegetables, but still very good.

title: Vegetarian Pasta Primavera
description: A light and colorful pasta dish with seasonal vegetables.
reviewText: A healthy and satisfying option for lunch.

title: Chicken Stir-Fry with Noodles
ingredients: Chicken breast, vegetables, stir-fry sauce, noodles
description: A quick and easy stir-fry with chicken, vegetables, and noodles.

title: Caprese Salad
ingredients: Tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, olive oil, balsamic vinegar
description: A refreshing and light salad with sliced tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil leaves, drizzled with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
reviewText: Simple but delicious! Perfect for a hot summer day.

title: Beef Tacos
ingredients: Ground beef, taco seasoning, tortillas, lettuce, tomato, cheese, salsa, sour cream (vegetarian option: omit beef)
description: Savory tacos with seasoned ground beef, crisp lettuce, fresh tomato, and melty cheese. Served with salsa and sour cream. (A vegetarian option is available without beef.)
